createAccount.question: How do I create a new account?
createAccount.answer: You can create a new account by clicking the "Sign Up" button on the homepage. You'll need to provide your email and create a password. After that, you'll receive a confirmation email to activate your account.

createShortLink.question: How do I create a short link?
createShortLink.answer: After logging into your account, go to the dashboard and click on "Create New Link". Enter the original link and choose a custom name if you wish. You can also organize links in hierarchical folders for easy management.

customizeButtons.question: How can I customize link buttons?
customizeButtons.answer: In the dashboard, select the link you want to customize and click on "Customize". You can choose from a variety of styles, colors, and effects to customize the button's appearance. You can also add icons and change fonts to match your visual identity.

integratePayments.question: How can I integrate payments with my links?
integratePayments.answer: Payment integration requires a subscription to the Professional or Enterprise plan. After upgrading, go to the link settings and enable the "Payment Integration" option. You can then connect your account to supported payment gateways such as Mada, Apple Pay, and My Fatoorah, and specify the amount, currency, and product description.

accessAnalytics.question: How can I access link analytics?
accessAnalytics.answer: You can access link analytics through the dashboard by clicking on the "Analytics" tab. There you'll find detailed statistics about the number of clicks, geographic location of visitors, devices used, and payment information if you've enabled this feature.
